ModMetaData.name: Animals Logic
ModMetaData.author: Oblitus
ModMetaData.description: [*] Tags trained animals in caravan and trade interfaces. [*] (Optional) Medical emergency alerts for animals. [*] (Optional) Configurable animal hauling efficiency. [*] (Optional) Configurable tameness decay threshold. [*] (Optional) Configurable training decay speed. [*] (Optional) Configurable rot chance for toxic buildup deaths. [*] (Optional) Converts any ruined eggs into unfertilized chicken eggs. [*] (Optional, default off) Converts any generic meat into chicken meat upon butchering. [*] (Optional) Allows animals to use food paste dispensers. [*] (Optional) Predators hunting your pawns (human-like or animals) will be considered hostile by all your pawns and turrets. [*] (Optional) Prevents animals from eating random stuff.
